member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC
member.summary: Implementation of the cyclic redundancy check error-detecting code as defined at http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cyclic_redundancy_check. This implementation is generalized to encompass all possible CRC parameters from 1 to 64 bits.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.#ctor(System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.#cctor
member.summary: Initializes static, dependent fields of the class.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.CalculateTable(System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting)
member.summary: Calculates the data-division table for the CRC parameters provided.
member.param: CRC parameters to calculate the table for.
member.returns: Array of UInt64 values that allows a CRC implementation to look up the result of dividing the index (data) by the polynomial.
member.remarks: Resulting array contains 256 items if settings.Bits >= 8, or 2 items if settings.Bits < 8. The table accounts for reflecting the index bits to fix the input endianness, but it is not possible completely account for the output endianness if the CRC is mixed-endianness.

member.name: F:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Standards
member.summary: Dictionary of Settings for each of the defined and implemented CRC standards.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Settings
member.summary: The CRC parameters to use when calculating the hash value.
member.value: The CRC parameters that will be used to calculate hash values.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.DefaultSettings
member.summary: The set of CRC parameters to use when constructing via the default constructor.
member.value: The current CRC parameters that will be used when a new instance is created via its default constructor.

member.name: T:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting
member.summary: Storage for all CRC calculation parameters and cache location of the CRC data-division table.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting.#ctor(System.Int32,System.UInt64,System.UInt64,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.exception: bits;bitLength must be in the range [1, 64].

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting.PreCalculateTable
member.summary: Calculates the DataDivisionTable property eagerly so that it is not calculated just-in-time.
member.returns: True if the table was calculated, false if the table has already been calculated.

member.name: M:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting.CheckInput(System.String,System.UInt64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Ensures that the 64-bit inputValue is not greater than the maximum unsigned value for a [bitLength]-length integer.
member.param: Name of the parameter being passed, used in exception that is thrown if the value is invalid.
Expected bit length of the inputValue parameter.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting.Bits
member.summary: Length of the produced CRC value, in bits.
member.value: The length of the produced CRC value, in bits

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting.Polynomial
member.summary: Divisor to use when calculating the CRC.
member.value: The divisor that will be used when calculating the CRC value.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting.InitialValue
member.summary: Value to initialize the CRC register to before calculating the CRC.
member.value: The value that will be used to initialize the CRC register before the calculation of the CRC value.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting.ReflectIn
member.summary: If true, the CRC calculation processes input as big endian bit order.
member.value: true if the input should be processed in big endian bit order; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting.ReflectOut
member.summary: If true, the CRC calculation processes the output as big endian bit order.
member.value: true if the CRC calculation processes the output as big endian bit order; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting.XOrOut
member.summary: Value to xor with the final CRC value.
member.value: The value to xor with the final CRC value.

member.name: P:System.Data.HashFunction.CRC.Setting.DataDivisionTable
member.summary: Lookup table of precalculated divisions of the index divided by the .
member.value: The precalculated table giving the result of dividing the items index by the .
